Another cruel change is the increase of repair costs, which is an amount of "Silver Lions" you need to pay in order to repair your vehicles and use them again after dying in them. TLDR; The devs have, and will continue to ruin the game by being greedy and making as much money as possible off of the player base, do NOT play this garbage, it is NOT worth the time investment.
